verses.text: Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H4196"\w* burn \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, \w of|strong="H4196"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, \w and|strong="H0753"\w* another \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w*, foursquare, \w and|strong="H0753"\w* \w two|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w*. \w Horns|strong="H7161"\w* shall \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w same|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w it|strong="H5439"\w* \w with|strong="H6823"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w as|strong="H2091"\w* well \w as|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* grate thereof, \w as|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w*. \w And|strong="H2091"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5439"\w* \w it|strong="H5439"\w* a crown \w of|strong="H7161"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* crown \w on|strong="H5921"\w* either \w side|strong="H6763"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bars|strong="H0905"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H5375"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bars|strong="H0905"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H6823"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* thou shalt \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hangeth \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H0727"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* propitiatory wherewith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* covered, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* speak \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H1242"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* smelling \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*. \w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* dress \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* place \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* everlasting \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w throughout|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w another|strong="H2114"\w* composition \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* oblation, \w and|strong="H4503"\w* victim, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* libations.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* pray \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* thereof \w once|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* offered \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* make \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w price|strong="H3724"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* scourge \w among|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* reckoned.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* passeth \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* naming, \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* sicle \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* standard \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* temple. \w A|strong="H5414"\w* sicle hath \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* obols. \w Half|strong="H4276"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* sicle \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w counted|strong="H6485"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w upwards|strong="H4605"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* price.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w add|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* sicle, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w man|strong="H6223"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w diminish|strong="H4591"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w which|strong="H4150"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w contributed|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thou shalt \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* uses \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* brazen \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \w with|strong="H7364"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* foot, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w in|strong="H7364"\w*: \w and|strong="H4196"\w* thou shalt \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. \w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* being \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w their|strong="H7364"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w it|strong="H1121"\w*:

\w When|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* testimony, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

Lest perhaps \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* law \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* successions.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

Saying: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w of|strong="H7218"\w* principal \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w chosen|strong="H3947"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* sicles, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w cinnamon|strong="H7076"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w much|strong="H4276"\w*, \w that|strong="H7070"\w* \w is|strong="H7218"\w*, \w two|strong="H3947"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* sicles, \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w calamus|strong="H7070"\w* \w in|strong="H3947"\w* like manner \w two|strong="H3947"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H8255"\w* \w cassia|strong="H6916"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* sicles \w by|strong="H1969"\w* \w the|strong="H3967"\w* weight \w of|strong="H8255"\w* \w the|strong="H3967"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \w of|strong="H8255"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H8255"\w* \w olives|strong="H2132"\w* \w the|strong="H3967"\w* measure \w hin|strong="H1969"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* unction, \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w* compounded \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w art|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w perfumer|strong="H7543"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0168"\w* therewith thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w and|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testament,

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* candlestick \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* belongeth \w to|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* service \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* thou shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H6942"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*: \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w*.

Thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H6942"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H6942"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* do \w the|strong="H0853"\w* office \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3547"\w* unto \w me|strong="H4886"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* unction \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w throughout|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* anointed therewith, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* other \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* composition, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* sanctified, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w What|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* soever \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* compound \w such|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thereof \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* stranger, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* compounded by \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w perfumer|strong="H7543"\w*, well tempered together, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* worthy \w of|strong="H4639"\w* sanctification.
